page.description: CouchDB client class for performing direct CRUD operations against a couchDB or couchBase endpoint.

methodref.name: AddRecordAttachment
methodref.description: Add or replace an attachment to a revision of a record.

methodref.name: CleanupViews
methodref.description: Clean up any unused couchdb views.

methodref.name: CommitChanges
methodref.description: Instructs couchdb to commit all changes to disk.

methodref.name: Create
methodref.description: Create a couchdb object.

methodref.name: CreateDatabase
methodref.description: Create couch database (first time in).

methodref.name: CreatePouch
methodref.description: Create a pouchdb object (local javascript couchdb implementation) - uses provided 'path' as base path for storing pouch data.

methodref.name: DatabaseCompact
methodref.description: Instructs couchdb to compact the database.

methodref.name: DeleteIndex
methodref.description: Remove index (if _index endpoint supported by backend).

methodref.name: DeleteRecordAttachment
methodref.description: Delete an attachment from a revision of a record.

methodref.name: DropDatabase
methodref.description: Delete the couchdb database.

methodref.name: GetDatabaseInfo
methodref.description: Just get the database top level information.

methodref.name: GetRecordAttachment
methodref.description: Get an attachment to a revision of a record.

methodref.name: GetRecordRevisions
methodref.description: Gets a document db record using 'id'.

methodref.name: GetRecords
methodref.description: MongoDB style query (using _find endpoint).

methodref.name: GetSecurity
methodref.description: Get security for database.

methodref.name: GetTemporaryView
methodref.description: Return the results of a temporary view (for development, avoid use for production site).

methodref.name: GetView
methodref.description: Query a saved view - leave viewName blank if same as design name.

methodref.name: GetViewKey
methodref.description: Get view documents that match the key.

methodref.name: GetViewRange
methodref.description: Get view with a key documents between the key values, inclusive flag for endkey is included.

methodref.name: GetViewValue
methodref.description: Just return the 'value' json.

methodref.name: ListDatabases
methodref.description: Get top level database list.

methodref.name: ListIndexes
methodref.description: Get list of indexes (if _index endpoint supported by backend).

methodref.name: ReplicateDatabase
methodref.description: Replicate a database.
